title: A wonderful place to work in real estate
pros: The people and the management team.
cons: Conservative benefits, somewhat limited upward mobility.

title: Saul Centers
pros: Some people are friendly. Nice building to work in. Parking is a good benefit. Restaurant and snack shop within the building.
cons: Not enough communication. Too many cliques - almost like high school.

title: BEWAREOF THIS COMPANY
pros: health insurance, 401k match however you can get that anywhere
cons: Unethical company, Unethical staff, antiquated way of doing things, HR shares confidential personal information with gossiping employees, racist and sexist practices, toxic and unhealthy work environment.
